mapper.sql: SELECT prod_crafwork_plm.ID id, prod_crafwork_plm.PROD_NO prodNo, prod_crafwork_plm.MID_PROD_NO midProdNo, prod_crafwork_plm.CRAFWORK_ID crafworkId, prod_crafwork_plm.CRAFWORK_DESC crafworkDesc, prod_crafwork_plm.PRICE price, prod_crafwork_plm.QUARTERS_EMP quartersEmp, prod_crafwork_plm.MODEL_NO modelNo, prod_crafwork_plm.BEF_CRAFWORK befCrafwork, prod_crafwork_plm.CARF_SEQ carfSeq, prod_crafwork_plm.AMOUNT amount, prod_crafwork_plm.UNIT unit, prod_crafwork_plm.MAC_MINUTES macMinutes, prod_crafwork_plm.EMP_MINUTES empMinutes, prod_crafwork_plm.IS_CHECK isCheck, prod_crafwork_plm.DAY_AMOUNT dayAmount, prod_crafwork_plm.REMARK remark, prod_crafwork_plm.DELETED deleted, prod_crafwork_plm.COMPANY_ID companyId, prod_crafwork_plm.CREATE_TIME createTime, prod_crafwork_plm.CREATE_BY createBy, prod_crafwork_plm.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, prod_crafwork_plm.MODIFY_BY modifyBy, crafwork_struct_plm.crafwork_name crafworkName
mapper.select:
FROM prod_crafwork_plm, crafwork_struct_plm
ORDER BY PROD_CRAFWORK_PLM.CARF_SEQ ASC

SELECT prod_crafwork_plm.id, prod_crafwork_plm.prod_no, prod_crafwork_plm.mid_prod_no, prod_crafwork_plm.crafwork_id, prod_crafwork_plm.crafwork_desc, prod_crafwork_plm.price, prod_crafwork_plm.quarters_emp, prod_crafwork_plm.model_no, prod_crafwork_plm.bef_crafwork, prod_crafwork_plm.carf_seq, prod_crafwork_plm.amount, prod_crafwork_plm.unit, prod_crafwork_plm.mac_minutes, prod_crafwork_plm.emp_minutes, prod_crafwork_plm.is_check, prod_crafwork_plm.day_amount, prod_crafwork_plm.remark, prod_crafwork_plm.deleted, prod_crafwork_plm.company_id, prod_crafwork_plm.create_time, prod_crafwork_plm.create_by, prod_crafwork_plm.modify_time, prod_crafwork_plm.modify_by, crafwork_struct_plm.crafwork_name crafworkName FROM prod_crafwork_plm, crafwork_struct_plm WHERE prod_crafwork_plm.crafwork_id = crafwork_struct_plm.id AND prod_crafwork_plm.carf_seq < #{carfSeq} AND prod_crafwork_plm.company_id = #{companyId} AND prod_crafwork_plm.deleted = 'F' AND prod_crafwork_plm.PROD_NO=#{prodNo} AND prod_crafwork_plm.MID_PROD_NO=#{midProdNo} ORDER BY prod_crafwork_plm.carf_seq DESC

SELECT prod_crafwork_plm.ID id, prod_crafwork_plm.PROD_NO prodNo, prod_crafwork_plm.MID_PROD_NO midProdNo, prod_crafwork_plm.CRAFWORK_ID crafworkId, prod_crafwork_plm.CRAFWORK_DESC crafworkDesc, prod_crafwork_plm.PRICE price, prod_crafwork_plm.QUARTERS_EMP quartersEmp, prod_crafwork_plm.MODEL_NO modelNo, prod_crafwork_plm.BEF_CRAFWORK befCrafwork, prod_crafwork_plm.CARF_SEQ carfSeq, prod_crafwork_plm.AMOUNT amount, prod_crafwork_plm.UNIT unit, prod_crafwork_plm.MAC_MINUTES macMinutes, prod_crafwork_plm.EMP_MINUTES empMinutes, prod_crafwork_plm.IS_CHECK isCheck, prod_crafwork_plm.DAY_AMOUNT dayAmount, prod_crafwork_plm.REMARK remark, prod_crafwork_plm.DELETED deleted, prod_crafwork_plm.COMPANY_ID companyId, prod_crafwork_plm.CREATE_TIME createTime, prod_crafwork_plm.CREATE_BY createBy, prod_crafwork_plm.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, prod_crafwork_plm.MODIFY_BY modifyBy, crafwork_struct_plm.crafwork_name crafworkName FROM prod_crafwork_plm, crafwork_struct_plm WHERE prod_crafwork_plm.crafwork_id = crafwork_struct_plm.id and prod_crafwork_plm.id > #{id} AND prod_crafwork_plm.DELETED = 'F' AND prod_crafwork_plm.company_id=#{companyId} AND prod_crafwork_plm.PROD_NO=#{prodNo} AND prod_crafwork_plm.MID_PROD_NO=#{midProdNo}
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROD_CRAFWORK_PLM
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MID_PROD_NO = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CRAFWORK_DESC = #{crafworkDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUARTERS_EMP = #{quartersEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_NO = #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEF_CRAFWORK = #{befCrafwork,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARF_SEQ = #{carfSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAC_MINUTES = #{macMinutes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EMP_MINUTES = #{empMinutes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_CHECK = #{isCheck,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DAY_AMOUNT = #{dayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
